text: int max ( int a , int b ) { int c ; c = a - b ; if ( c >= 0 ) return a ; else return b ; } main ( ) { int n , size ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & size ) ; int a [ size ] [ size ] , i , k ; for ( i = 0 ; i < size ; i ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= i ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ k ] ) ; } } i = size - 2 ; while ( i >= 0 ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= i ; k ++ ) { a [ i ] [ k ] = max ( a [ i ] [ k ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ k ] , a [ i ] [ k ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) ; } i -- ; } printf ( "%d" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
